page.title: 06EDUCATION..SCHOOLS
page.content: The educational provision in this area consists of one non-denominational comprehensive - Coltness High School {(GR.805559)}c.f photo No.1 centre view There are four non-denom. primary schools:- Morningside{(GR.828556), } Newmains{(GR.821558),}Cambusnethan {(GR.806555),}Coltness{(GR.802566)}and two R.C. St.Brigid{(GR.822562)}and St.Aidain's{(GR.802564) }. Victoria Park School{(GR.821557)}and the Edward Lawson Centre , named after and opened by a former Lord Provost of Wishaw{,(GR.801565)}are the two special schools, i.e. for the handicapped, in the area. There are also adult education classes in Cambusnethan Community Hall {(GR.809557)}.
